statements: SELECT * FROM supply_chain_info WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity FROM supply_chain_info WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM supply_chain_info WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, delivery_date FROM supply_chain_info WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND product_id = 4;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, delivery_date FROM supply_chain_info WHERE quantity > 100 AND delivery_date < '2022-02-28' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_info WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM supply_chain_info WHERE supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity FROM supply_chain_info WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-01-01' AND delivery_date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY supplier_name
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM supply_chain_info WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 3, 5) ORDER BY product_id ASC, supplier_id DESC
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM supply_chain_info GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_quantity_sold > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_nodes WHERE node_type = 'Supplier';
SELECT node_name, risk_score FROM supply_chain_nodes ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_relationships WHERE severity_score > 0.5;
SELECT node_name, location_id FROM supply_chain_nodes WHERE location_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT node_type FROM supply_chain_nodes;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_nodes;
SELECT node_id, node_name, node_type FROM supply_chain_nodes WHERE risk_score > 0.5 ORDER BY node_name ASC;
SELECT node_name, location_id FROM supply_chain_nodes WHERE node_type = 'factory' ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT relationship_type, severity_score FROM supply_chain_relationships WHERE parent_node_id = 3 AND child_node_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_nodes WHERE node_name LIKE '%warehouse%';
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainLocations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Products WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT location_name, address FROM SupplyChainLocations WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainLocations WHERE location_name = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT location_name, address FROM SupplyChainLocations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, address FROM SupplyChainLocations WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, location_name FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN SupplyChainLocations l ON p.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_name, description, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100.00;
SELECT order_id, quantity, total_price FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, status FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_price ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, status FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers WHERE id=1;
SELECT name, category FROM products ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT s.name AS supplier_name, o.quantity AS order_quantity FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.id = p.supplier_id JOIN orders o ON o.product_id = p.id;
SELECT d.reason, d.delay_days FROM disruptions d JOIN shipments s ON d.shipment_id = s.id WHERE d.delay_days > 3;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT products.name, suppliers.name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.id;
SELECT orders.order_date, products.name, shipments.delivery_status FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.id JOIN shipments ON orders.id = shipments.order_id;
SELECT disruptions.reason, shipments.shipment_date FROM disruptions JOIN shipments ON disruptions.shipment_id = shipments.id WHERE disruptions.delay_days > 3;
